Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Player is the person who play the game.
    Version:
    1.3
    Author:
    Idris

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String name,
              Strategy strategy)
        Constructor of player used at the beginning of the game
        Parameters:
        name - the name of game players
        strategy - there are 5 strategies 0: Greedy - try to make dedication as possible 1: Unfriendly - try not to help other players as possible 2: Random - random everything as possible (high overhead) 3: Basic - choose only first option on place laketile as possible 4: Human - you can control everything by yourself

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String name,
              java.util.ArrayList<LanternCard> lanternCards,
              java.util.ArrayList<LakeTile> lakeTiles,
              java.util.ArrayList<DedicationToken> dedicationTokens,
              int numberOfFavorTokens)
        Constructor of player used when the game loading
        Parameters:
        name - player name
        lanternCards - list of lantern cards which player has
        lakeTiles - list of lake tiles on player hand
        dedicationTokens - list of dedication tokens which player has
        numberOfFavorTokens - the number of favor token which player has
